summary.problem: User needs a bi-weekly cotton production dataset for Pakistan extracted from PDF reports published on a public website, including specific values: Total Arrivals Punjab, Total Arrivals Sindh, and Total Arrivals Pakistan (all in bales). Additionally, the dataset requires regular updates to include new data as it becomes available.
summary.solution: A dataset was created and made available on the platform with a specific dataset code. The dataset extracts the required three values from the PDF reports published at https://www.pcga.org/arrival-reports/. Furthermore, the dataset was configured to run as a recurring weekly task to automatically update and add new data when available from the source, ensuring the dataset remains current without manual intervention.
